entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Rocky Harbour

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 2:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 2:58 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 2:58 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
